attributes.additional_details:
A National Concert to be held at Every National Stadium every 3 years in honour of our Armed Forces. The funds to be donated (tax free) to all who have been affected.  The Government should encourage all UK Musical acts to participate in these events!

The Government is so willing to spend hundreds of millions of pounds every year to countries that support terrorism-It is Now Time they spend some funds on BRITISH HEROES . So the Government should pay at least 100% of the fee to fund these events over the next 15 years.

Also that no politician should attend these events for political gain.
